resources.string: Please end all calls and shut down applications to cool down the phone.
The phone is currently in Cool Down mode. Emergency calls only.
The phone temperature is too high. It will now be shut down.
The temperature is outside the acceptable range
Cannot detect the battery temperature. Make sure the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not charge.
Make sure the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not charge.
Currently unable to detect the battery temperature. The phone is in Cool Down mode, and can only be used for emergency calls. Make sure the battery is installed correctly.
Please contact our Customer Service Centre, telephone %1$s Thank you.
Please contact our Customer Service Centre, Thank you.
"The phone's temperature is higher than normal. Reduce the brightness to cool down the phone."
The maximum charging limit has been reached due to high temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
The maximum charging limit has been reached due to low temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
We provide brightness reduction and application shut downs to cool down the device at the push of a button.
The device temperature is too high. It will now be shut down.
The battery temperature is too low, so charging has stopped.
Currently unable to detect the battery temperature. The device is in Cool Down mode, and can only be used for emergency calls. Make sure the battery is installed correctly.
Make sure the battery is properly installed.
The battery temperature is too high, so charging has stopped.
The device is currently in Cool Down mode. Please do not try to use it at this time.
Please use the original battery to charge, or you could cause permanent/physical damage to your device.

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down. You can still use it, but you may notice: 路Charging might pause. 路WiFi might be turned off. 路Applications might be closed. 路Aeroplane mode might be turned on. Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."
